動物用藥品名稱: 海博萊雞新城病活毒疫苗(CL/79株)
業者名稱: 西班牙商海博萊大藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司
效能(適應症): 肉雞、母雞、種雛雞、蛋雛雞：預防新城病。
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENT:ATTENUATED LIVE NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, CLONE CL/79：10^6.5EID50-10^7.7 EID50; CONSTITUENTS OF THE EXCIPIENT: POTASSIUM CHLORIDE0.00288MG; GELATIN 0.04000MG; DISODIUM PHOSPHATE DODECAHYDRATE0.02985MG; POTASSIUM DIHYDROGEN PHOSPHATE 0.00198MG; SODIUMCHLORIDE 0.00080MG; POVIDONE 0.19977MG; SUCROSE 1.49844MG;MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE 0.09987MG; WATER FOR INJECTIONS 加至0.03ML.
